home.title: Welcome at DSI RC !
home.subtitle: This is a demo showing a fullstack application, which skeleton has been generated with with JHipster.

logged.message: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".

home.question: If you have any question on JHipster:
home.item1: An Angular front-end with Bootstrap, HTML 5 and SASS.
home.item2: A Spring Boot back-end exposing a fictitious PENSIONS domain, with all its required business objects, entities, services, DTO, converters, mappers and the other mandatory components.
home.item3: A JWT based authentication and authorization security.
home.item4: Front-end unit, integration and E2E tests with Jest and Protractor.
home.item5: Back-end unit, integration and E2E tests with Junit, Gatling and Cucumber.
home.item8: JPA persistence with Spring Data and Hibernate.
home.item10: Use of SonarQube for the code quality management
home.item11: Use of Docker to simplify the deployment
home.like: If you like JHipster, don't forget to give us a star on
